0:
[OUTPUT]
    Name http
    Match kube.*
    Host {{ .Release.Name }}-victoria-logs-single-server
    port 9428
    compress gzip
    uri /insert/jsonline?_stream_fields=stream,kubernetes_pod_name&_msg_field=log&_time_field=date
    format json_lines
    json_date_format iso8601
    header AccountID 0
    header ProjectID 0

[FILTER]
    Name kubernetes
    Match kube.*
    Merge_Log On
    Keep_Log On
    K8S-Logging.Parser On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude On
[FILTER]
    Name                nest
    Match               *
    Wildcard            pod_name
    Operation lift
    Nested_under kubernetes
    Add_prefix   kubernetes_

---
modules:
  elastic_test:
    connection:
      type: elastic
      username: "elastic"
      password: "$(ES_PASS)"
      index: "logs-k3s-prod"
      query: |
        {
          "size": 0,
          "aggs": {
            "namespace_counts": {
              "terms": {
                "field": "kubernetes.pod_namespace",
                "size": 10000
              }
            }
          }
        }
    metrics:
    - name: kubernetes_namespace
      type: object
      help: total docs
      path: '{}'
      labels:
        namespace: 'datahub'
      values:
        docs: '{ .aggregations.namespace_counts.buckets[?(@.key == "datahub")].doc_count }'
    - name: kubernetes_namespace
      type: object
      help: total docs
      path: '{}'
      labels:
        namespace: 'networking'
      values:
        docs: '{ .aggregations.namespace_counts.buckets[?(@.key == "networking")].doc_count }'

[zodiark]
type = ftp
host = zodiark.parsec.sh
user = anonymous
pass = gIXs6-hO5MLIuYg0s3DvfL0P4_-ZbETioA
port = 21
